class_options.name: skip_namespace
class_options.description: Skip namespace (affects only isolated engines)

class_options.name: skip_collision_check
class_options.description: Skip collision check

class_options.name: force
class_options.description: Overwrite files that already exist

class_options.name: pretend
class_options.description: Run but do not make any changes

class_options.name: quiet
class_options.description: Suppress status output

class_options.name: skip
class_options.description: Skip files that already exist

class_options.name: ruby
class_options.description: Path to the Ruby binary of your choice

class_options.name: template
class_options.description: Path to some application template (can be a filesystem path or URL)

class_options.description: Preconfigure for selected database (options: mysql/postgresql/sqlite3/oracle/sqlserver/jdbcmysql/jdbcsqlite3/jdbcpostgresql/jdbc)

class_options.name: dev

class_options.name: main
class_options.description: Set up the application with Gemfile pointing to Rails repository main branch

class_options.name: rc
class_options.description: Path to file containing extra configuration options for rails command

class_options.name: no_rc
class_options.description: Skip loading of extra configuration options from .railsrc file

class_options.name: help
class_options.description: Show this help message and quit

class_options.name: version
class_options.description: Show Rails version number and quit

class_options.description: Preconfigure smaller stack for API only apps
